atk-s0513a3:2605_20: svāhaṃ tumhākaṃ ānubhāvena tassa akkhīni labhissāmīti tumhe upaṭṭhahāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2605_23: labhissasī”ti taṃ assāsetvā puna divase brāhmaṇassa āgamanamagge kedāramariyādaṃ nissāya tiṇehi paṭicchanno hutvā tassāgamanaṃ olokento nipajji.
atk-s0513a3:2606_0: Bodhisatto āgacchanto paṭhamaṃ sobbhaṃ otaritvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā sinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā suvaṇṇakakkaṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2606_2: Sappo taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva vegena pakkhanditvā piṇḍikamaṃse ḍaṃsitvā tattheva pātetvā vammikaṃ sandhāya palāyi.
atk-s0513a3:2606_3: Bodhisattassa patanañca kakkaṭakassa sāṭakantarato laṅghanañca kākassa āgantvā bodhisattassa ure nilīyanañca apacchāapurimaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2606_5: Kakkaṭako “imaṃ kākaṃ nissāya mama sahāyassa bhayaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2606_6: etasmiṃ gahite sappo āgacchissatī”ti saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya kākaṃ gīvāyaṃ aḷena daḷhaṃ gahetvā kilametvā thokaṃ sithilamakāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2606_11: tāva ehī”ti sappaṃ pakkosanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2609_0: Tenābhibhūto kapaṇaṃ rudāmi, hare sakhā kissa nu maṃ jahāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2610_0: Tattha siṅgīmigoti siṅgīsuvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya vā aḷasaṅkhātānaṃ vā siṅgānaṃ atthitāya kakkaṭako vutto.
atk-s0513a3:2611_0: Sappo taṃ sutvā mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā kākaṃ assāsento agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2611_1: Satthā imamatthaṃ dīpento abhisambuddho hutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2614_0: Sakhā sakhāraṃ paritāyamāno, bhujaṅgamaṃ kakkaṭako gahesī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2615_5: Gahesīti dutiyena aḷena gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahesi.
atk-s0513a3:2616_1: Atha sappo “kakkaṭakā nāma neva kākamaṃsaṃ khādanti,
atk-s0513a3:2616_3: atha kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ amhe gaṇhī”ti cintetvā taṃ pucchanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2618_0: “Na vāyasaṃ no pana kaṇhasappaṃ, ghāsatthiko kakkaṭako adeyya;
atk-s0513a3:2619_0: Pucchāmi taṃ āyatacakkhunetta, atha kissa hetumha ubho gahītā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2620_0: Tattha ghāsatthikoti āhāratthiko hutvā. Adeyyātiādiyeyya, na-kārena yojetvā na gaṇhīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:2621_0: Taṃ sutvā kakkaṭako gahaṇakāraṇaṃ kathento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2623_0: “Ayaṃ puriso mama atthakāmo, yo maṃ gahetvāna dakāya neti;
atk-s0513a3:2624_0: Tasmiṃ mate dukkhamanappakaṃ me, ahañca eso ca ubho na homa.
atk-s0513a3:2626_0: “Mamañca disvāna pavaddhakāyaṃ, sabbo jano hiṃsitumeva micche;
atk-s0513a3:2627_0: Sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, kākāpi maṃ disva viheṭhayeyyu”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2628_2: Dakāya netīti yo maṃ sampiyāyamāno uttarisāṭakena gahetvāna udakāya neti,
atk-s0513a3:2628_4: Tasmiṃ mateti sace so imasmiṃ ṭhāne marissati,
atk-s0513a3:2628_5: etasmiṃ mate mama kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ bhavissatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a3:2628_6: Ubho na homāti dvepi janā na bhavissāma.
atk-s0513a3:2628_9: imasmiṃ mate anāthaṃ nippaccayaṃ maṃ pavaḍḍhitakāyaṃ disvā sabbo jano “imassa kakkaṭakassa sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsa”nti maṃ māretuṃ iccheyya,
atk-s0513a3:2628_11: tiracchānabhūtā kākāpi maṃ disvā viheṭhayeyyuṃ viheseyyuṃ māreyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2629_0: Taṃ sutvā sappo cintesi “ekenupāyena imaṃ vañcetvā kākañca attānañca mocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2631_0: “Sacetassa hetumha ubho gahītā, uṭṭhātu pose visamāvamāmi;
atk-s0513a3:2632_0: Mamañca kākañca pamuñca khippaṃ, pure visaṃ gāḷhamupeti macca”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2633_0: Tattha sacetassa hetūti sace etassa kāraṇā.
atk-s0513a3:2633_4: Pure visaṃ gāḷhamupeti maccanti imañhi maccaṃ mayā anāvamiyamānaṃ visaṃ gāḷhaṃ balavaṃ hutvā upagaccheyya,
atk-s0513a3:2633_6: tāvadeva amhe dvepi jane khippaṃ muñcāti.
atk-s0513a3:2634_0: Taṃ sutvā kakkaṭako cintesi “ayaṃ ekenupāyena maṃ dvepi jane vissajjāpetvā palāyitukāmo,
atk-s0513a3:2634_2: ahaṃ dāni yathā sappo sañcarituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0513a3:2634_4: kākaṃ pana neva vissajjessāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2636_0: “Sappaṃ pamokkhāmi na tāva kākaṃ, paṭibandhako hohiti tāva kāko;
atk-s0513a3:2637_0: Purisañca disvāna sukhiṃ arogaṃ, kākaṃ pamokkhāmi yatheva sappa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2638_1: Yatheva sappanti yathā bhavantaṃ sappaṃ muñcāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2638_3: kevalaṃ tvaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa sarīrato sīghaṃ visaṃ āvamāhīti.
atk-s0513a3:2639_0: Evañca pana vatvā tassa sukhasañcāraṇatthaṃ aḷaṃ sithilamakāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2639_1: Sappo visaṃ āvamitvā mahāsattassa sarīraṃ nibbisaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2639_3: Kakkaṭako “sace ime dvepi janā arogā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a3:2639_4: mayhaṃ sahāyassa vaḍḍhi nāma na bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:2639_5: vināsessāmi ne”ti cintetvā kattarikāya uppalamakuḷaṃ viya aḷehi ubhinnampi sīsaṃ kappetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2639_7: Bodhisatto sappassa sarīraṃ daṇḍake veṭhetvā gumbapiṭṭhe khipi.
atk-s0513a3:2639_8: Suvaṇṇakakkaṭakaṃ sobbhe vissajjetvā nhatvā sālindiyagāmameva gato.
atk-s0513a3:2639_9: Tato paṭṭhāya kakkaṭakena saddhiṃ adhikataro vissāso ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2640_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2642_0: “Kāko tadā devadatto ahosi, māro pana kaṇhasappo ahosi;
atk-s0513a3:2643_0: Ānandabhaddo kakkaṭako ahosi, ahaṃ tadā brāhmaṇo homi satthā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2644_0: Saccapariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Kākī pana gāthāya na vuttā, sā ciñcamāṇavikā ahosīti.
atk-s0513a3:2648_0: Sakuṇo mayhako nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āgantukaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2648_1: Sāvatthiyañhi āgantukaseṭṭhi nāma aḍḍho ahosi mahaddhano.
atk-s0513a3:2648_4: nānaggarase paṇīte bhojane upanīte taṃ na bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a3:2648_6: dhūpitavāsitesu kāsikavatthesu upanītesu tāni hāretvā thūlathūlasāṭake nivāseti,
atk-s0513a3:2648_7: ājānīyayutte maṇikanakavicitte rathe upanīte tampi harāpetvā kattararathakena gacchati,
atk-s0513a3:2648_8: suvaṇṇacchatte dhāriyamāne taṃ apanetvā paṇṇacchattena dhāriyamānena.
atk-s0513a3:2648_9: So yāvajīvaṃ dānādīsu puññesu ekampi akatvā kālaṃ katvā roruvaniraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a3:2648_10: Tassa aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājabalaṃ sattahi rattidivasehi rājakulaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a3:2648_11: Tasmiṃ pavesite rājā bhuttapātarāso jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisinno “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:2648_13: sāvatthiyaṃ āgantukaseṭṭhino nāma kālakatassa assāmikadhane amhākaṃ ghare āhariyamāneyeva satta rattidivasā gatā,
atk-s0513a3:2648_14: so pana etaṃ dhanaṃ labhitvāpi neva attanā paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a3:2648_17: so ekadivasampi paṇītabhojanādīnaṃ rasaṃ ananubhavitvāva maraṇamukhaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0513a3:2648_18: evaṃ maccharī apuññasatto kiṃ katvā ettakaṃ dhanaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a3:2648_19: kena cassa bhogesu cittaṃ na ramī”ti satthāraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:2648_22: dhanaṃ laddhā aparibhuñjanakāraṇañca teneva kata”nti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2649_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiseṭṭhi assaddho ahosi maccharī,
atk-s0513a3:2649_3: So ekadivasaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto tagarasikhiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā vanditvā “laddhā, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:2649_4: bhikkhā”ti pucchitvā “nanu carāma mahāseṭṭhī”ti vutte purisaṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha,
atk-s0513a3:2649_5: imaṃ amhākaṃ gharaṃ ānetvā mama pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā amhākaṃ paṭiyattabhattassa pattaṃ pūretvā dāpehī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2649_6: So paccekabuddhaṃ gharaṃ netvā nisīdāpetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a3:2649_7: Sā nānaggarasabhattassa pattaṃ pūretvā tassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2649_8: So bhattaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhinivesanā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiyaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a3:2649_9: Seṭṭhi rājakulato paccāgacchanto taṃ disvā vanditvā “laddhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:2649_12: So pattaṃ oloketvā cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a3:2649_13: “imaṃ me bhattaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjitvā dukkarampi kammaṃ kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2649_14: aho vata me jānī”ti aparacetanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:2649_15: Dānañhi nāma tisso cetanā paripuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkontasseva mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a3:2650_0: “Pubbeva dānā sumanā bhavāma, dadampi ve attamanā bhavāma;
atk-s0513a3:2651_0: Datvāpi ve nānutappāma pacchā, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā namiyyare. ;
atk-s0513a3:2653_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā”. ;
atk-s0513a3:2654_1: āgantukaseṭṭhi tagarasikhipaccekabuddhassa dinnapaccayena bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a3:2654_2: datvā aparacetanaṃ paṇītaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya bhoge bhuñjituṃ nāsakkhīti.
atk-s0513a3:2654_6: mahārājā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2655_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhave seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a3:2655_1: mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kaniṭṭhaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā kuṭumbaṃ vicārento gharadvāre dānasālaṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2655_4: So tassa padasā gamanakāle kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā saddhiṃ puttadārena sabbaṃ gharavibhavaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2655_5: kaniṭṭhassa niyyātetvā “appamatto dānaṃ pavattehī”ti ovādaṃ datvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca
atk-s0513a3:2655_8: So taṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ disvā cintesi “mama bhātu putte jīvante kuṭumbaṃ bhinditvā dvidhā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:2655_10: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nadiyaṃ opilāpetvā māresi.
atk-s0513a3:2655_11: Tamenaṃ nhatvā āgataṃ bhātu jāyā “kuhiṃ mama putto”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:2656_0: Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “idaṃ kiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti ākāsenāgantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ otaritvā sunivattho
atk-s0513a3:2656_1: supāruto tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā dānasālaṃ adisvā “dānasālāpi iminā asappurisena nāsitā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a3:2656_2: Kaniṭṭho tassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojesi.
atk-s0513a3:2656_3: So bhattakiccāvasāne sukhakathāya nisinno “dārako na paññāyati,
atk-s0513a3:2656_10: nanu tvaṃ iminā nāma kāraṇena taṃ māresi,
atk-s0513a3:2656_11: kiṃ nu tvaṃ rājādīnaṃ vasena nassamānaṃ dhanaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a3:2656_13: Athassa mahāsatto buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2662_0: Bhutvāna pipphaliṃ yanti, vilapatveva so dijo.
atk-s0513a3:2667_0: “Na so acchādanaṃ bhattaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2668_0: Anubhoti sakiṃ kiñci, na saṅgaṇhāti ñātake.
atk-s0513a3:2671_0: Rājāno atha vā corā, dāyādā yeva appiyā;
atk-s0513a3:2675_0: Tena so kittiṃ pappoti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2676_2: Pakkaṃ pipphalinti himavantapadese ekaṃ phalabharitaṃ pipphalirukkhaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2676_3: Kandatīti dijagaṇe taṃ rukkhaṃ parivāretvā pakkāni khādante vāretuṃ “mayhaṃ mayha”nti paridevanto vicarati.
atk-s0513a3:2676_5: Bhutvāna vipphaliṃ yantīti taṃ pipphalirukkhaṃ paribhuñjitvā aññaṃ phalasampannaṃ rukkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0513a3:2676_8: mātāpitābhātubhaginīputtadhītādīnaṃ upabhogaparibhogavasena yo yo koṭṭhāso dātabbo,
atk-s0513a3:2677_4: Vilapatveva so naroti etesu rājādīsu dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchantesu kevalaṃ so puriso vilapatiyeva.
atk-s0513a3:2677_6: Saṅgaṇhātīti attano santikaṃ āgate dubbalañātake bhattacchādanabījanaṅgalādidānena saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a3:2677_7: Tenāti so puriso tena ñātisaṅgahena catuparisamajjhe kittiñca attano vaṇṇabhaṇanañca pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a3:2678_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto tassa dhammaṃ desetvā dānaṃ pākatikaṃ kāretvā himavantameva gantvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2679_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “iti kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:2679_1: āgantukaseṭṭhi bhātu puttassa māritattā ettakaṃ kālaṃ neva puttaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2679_2: na dhītaraṃ alabhī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:2683_0: Dubbaṇṇarūpanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lokatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2683_4: pubbepi tathāgato lokatthacariyaṃ cariyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2684_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakko ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2684_1: Tadā eko vijjādharo vijjaṃ parivattetvā aḍḍharattasamaye āgantvā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā saddhiṃ aticarati,
atk-s0513a3:2684_4: eko puriso aḍḍharattasamaye sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā maṃ dūsetī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:2684_6: devā”ti sā jātihiṅgulikapātiṃ āharāpetvā tassa purisassa rattiṃ āgantvā abhiramitvā gacchantassa piṭṭhiyaṃ pañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā pātova rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:2684_9: Vijjādharopi rattiṃ anācāraṃ katvā divā susāne sūriyaṃ namassanto ekapādena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a3:2684_11: So “pākaṭaṃ me kammaṃ jāta”nti vijjaṃ parivattetvā ākāsena uppatitvā gato.
atk-s0513a3:2685_4: “So hi rattiṃ anācāraṃ katvā divā pabbajitavesena vasati”.
atk-s0513a3:2685_5: Rājā “ime divā samaṇavesena caritvā rattiṃ anācāraṃ karontī”ti pabbajitānaṃ kujjhitvā micchāgahaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a3:2685_8: Tiyojanasatikā kāsiraṭṭhā palāyitvā sabbe pabbajitā aññarājadhāniyo agamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2685_9: Sakalakāsiraṭṭhe manussānaṃ ovādadāyako ekopi dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇo nāhosi.
atk-s0513a3:2686_0: Sakko nave devaputte apassanto “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjetvā vijjādharaṃ nissāya bārāṇasiraññā kuddhena
atk-s0513a3:2686_1: micchāgahaṇaṃ gahetvā pabbajitānaṃ raṭṭhā pabbājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño imassa rañño micchāgahaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2686_3: rañño ca raṭṭhavāsīnañca avassayo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā nandamūlapabbhāre paccekabuddhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a3:2686_7: athassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā taṃ purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato hutvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2686_8: namassanto uttamarūpadharo māṇavako hutvā sakalanagarassa matthakena tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā rājadvāraṃ
atk-s0513a3:2686_11: abhirūpo māṇavako ekaṃ samaṇaṃ ānetvā rājadvāre ākāse ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2686_13: kasmā tvaṃ abhirūpo samāno etassa virūpassa samaṇassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā namassamāno ṭhito”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2689_0: Seyyo nu teso udavā sarikkho, nāmaṃ parassattano cāpi brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2690_1: Seyyo nu tesoti eso virūpo pabbajito kiṃ nu tayā uttaritaro,
atk-s0513a3:2690_3: Nāmaṃ parassattano cāpīti etassa parassa ca attano ca nāmaṃ brūhīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a3:2691_2: tena me nāmaṃ lapituṃ na labbhati,
atk-s0513a3:2691_3: mayhaṃ pana te nāmaṃ kathessāmī”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2694_0: Ahañca te nāmadheyyaṃ vadāmi, sakkohamasmī tidasānamindo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2695_1: sabbasaṅkhāre yathā sabhāvasarasavasena sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pattattā sammaggatānaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2695_2: ujunā ca aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena nibbānaṃ gatattā ujugatānaṃ mahākhīṇāsavānaṃ upapattidevehi uttaritarānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2695_4: Ahañca te nāmadheyyanti apica ahaṃ attano nāmadheyyaṃ tuyhaṃ kathemi.
atk-s0513a3:2696_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tatiyagāthāya bhikkhunamassane ānisaṃsaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0513a3:2698_0: “Yo disvā bhikkhuṃ caraṇūpapannaṃ, purakkhatvā pañjaliko namassati;
atk-s0513a3:2699_0: Pucchāmi taṃ devarājetamatthaṃ, ito cuto kiṃ labhate sukhaṃ so”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2702_0: “Yo disvā bhikkhuṃ caraṇūpapannaṃ, purakkhatvā pañjaliko namassati;
atk-s0513a3:2703_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme labhate pasaṃsaṃ, saggañca so yāti sarīrabhedā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2704_2: Diṭṭheva dhammeti na kevalaṃ ito cutoyeva,
atk-s0513a3:2704_3: imasmiṃ pana attabhāve so pasaṃsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a3:2705_0: Rājā sakkassa kathaṃ sutvā attano micchāgahaṇaṃ bhinditvā tuṭṭhamānaso pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2707_0: “Lakkhī vata me udapādi ajja, yaṃ vāsavaṃ bhūtapatiddasāma;
atk-s0513a3:2708_0: Bhikkhuñca disvāna tuvañca sakka, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2709_3: ajja mama tava vacanaṃ suṇantasseva kusalākusalavipākajānanapaññā udapādīti.
atk-s0513a3:2710_0: Taṃ sutvā sakko paṇḍitassa thutiṃ karonto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2712_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0513a3:2713_0: Bhikkhuñca disvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2718_0: Nihacca mānaṃ abhivādayissaṃ, sutvāna devinda subhāsitānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2719_0: Tattha sabbātithīyācayogo bhavitvāti sabbesaṃ atithīnaṃ āgatānaṃ āgantukānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ te yācanti,
atk-s0513a3:2719_3: Sutvāna devinda subhāsitānīti tava subhāsitāni sutvā ahaṃ evarūpo bhavissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:2720_0: Evañca pana vatvā pāsādā oruyha paccekabuddhaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2720_7: Sakkopi sakkānubhāvena ākāse ṭhatvā “ito paṭṭhāya appamattā hothā”ti nāgarānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā “palātā samaṇabrāhmaṇā āgacchantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2720_9: Rājā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2721_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:2725_0: Yametanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2725_1: So kira jetavanā nikkhamitvā kosalaraṭṭhe aññataraṃ araññaṃ nissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ padumasaraṃ
atk-s0513a3:2725_2: otaritvā supupphitapadumaṃ disvā adhovāte ṭhatvā upasiṅghi.
atk-s0513a3:2725_3: Atha naṃ tasmiṃ vane adhivatthā devatā “mārisa,
atk-s0513a3:2725_6: So tāya saṃvejito puna jetavanaṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisinno “kahaṃ bhikkhu nivutthosī”ti puṭṭho “asukavanasaṇḍe nāma,
atk-s0513a3:2725_7: tattha ca maṃ devatā evaṃ nāma saṃvejesī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:2725_8: Atha naṃ satthā “na kho bhikkhu pupphaṃ upasiṅghanto tvameva devatāya saṃvejito,
atk-s0513a3:2725_9: porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi saṃvejitapubbā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2726_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kāsikagāme brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a3:2726_1: takkasilāyaṃ uggahitasippo aparabhāge isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekaṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya upavasanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2726_3: Atha naṃ ekā devadhītā rukkhakkhandhavivare ṭhatvā saṃvejayamānā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2733_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2734_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2735_0: Tattha ārā siṅghāmīti dūre ṭhito ghāyāmi. Vaṇṇenāti kāraṇena.
atk-s0513a3:2736_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko puriso tasmiṃ sare bhisāni ceva khaṇati,
atk-s0513a3:2736_2: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “maṃ ārā ṭhatvā upasiṅghantaṃ ‘coro’ti vadasi,
atk-s0513a3:2736_3: etaṃ purisaṃ kasmā na bhaṇasī”ti tāya saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2739_0: Evaṃ ākiṇṇakammanto, kasmā eso na vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2741_0: Athassa avacanakāraṇaṃ ācikkhantī devatā catutthapañcamagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2744_0: Tasmiṃ me vacanaṃ natthi, tañcārahāmi vattave.
atk-s0513a3:2748_0: Tattha dhāticelaṃvāti kheḷasiṅghāṇikamuttagūthamakkhitaṃ dhātidāsiyā nivatthacelaṃ viya ayaṃ pāpamakkhitoyeva,
atk-s0513a3:2748_1: tena kāraṇena tasmiṃ mama vacanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a3:2748_2: Tañcārahāmīti samaṇā pana ovādakkhamā honti piyasīlā,
atk-s0513a3:2748_3: tasmā taṃ appamattakampi ayuttaṃ karontaṃ vattuṃ arahāmi samaṇāti.
atk-s0513a3:2748_6: idāni kasmā evarūpaṃ dosaṃ abbohārikaṃ karosīti.
atk-s0513a3:2749_0: Tāya pana saṃvejito bodhisatto saṃvegappatto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2751_0: “Addhā maṃ yakkha jānāsi, atho maṃ anukampasi;
atk-s0513a3:2752_0: Punapi yakkha vajjāsi, yadā passasi edisa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2753_2: Yadā passasi edisanti yadā mama evarūpaṃ dosaṃ passasi,
atk-s0513a3:2757_0: Tvameva bhikkhu jāneyya, yena gaccheyya suggati”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2758_0: Tattha bhatakāmhaseti tava bhatihatā kammakarāpi na homa.
atk-s0513a3:2758_1: Kiṃkāraṇā taṃ sabbakālaṃ rakkhamānā vicarissāmāti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a3:2758_2: Yena gaccheyyāti bhikkhu yena kammena tvaṃ sugatiṃ gaccheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a3:2759_0: Evaṃ sā tassa ovādaṃ datvā attano vimānameva paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a3:2760_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:2761_0: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2765_0: Susukhaṃ vata jīvantīti idaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto keḷisīlake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2765_1: Tesu hi mahāmoggallānattherena pāsādaṃ kampetvā saṃvejitesu dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū tesaṃ aguṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2765_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a3:2766_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakko ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2766_1: Atha aññatarasmiṃ kāsikagāme satta bhātaro kāmesu dosaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā majjhāraññe
atk-s0513a3:2766_2: vasantā yoge yogaṃ akatvā kāyadaḷhībahulā hutvā nānappakāraṃ kīḷaṃ kīḷantā cariṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2766_3: Sakko devarājā “ime saṃvejessāmī”ti suko hutvā tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ rukkhe nilīyitvā te saṃvejento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2769_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2771_0: Atha tesu eko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā avasese āmantetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2775_3: Sodariyāti samāne udare vutthabhāvena te ālapanto āha.
atk-s0513a3:2776_0: Atha ne paṭikkhipanto suko tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2781_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabbepi catutthaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:2786_1: Vighāsenevāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ satta vassāni sīhabyagghavighāseneva yāpentā yadi bhoto gārayhā,
atk-s0513a3:2792_0: Taṃ sutvā tāpasā “sace mayaṃ na vighāsādā,
atk-s0513a3:2792_2: Atha tesaṃ so tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2795_0: Datvāva sesaṃ bhuñjanti, te janā vighāsādino”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2796_0: Tattha vanibbinoti taṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yācanakassa. Evaṃ te lajjāpetvā mahāsatto sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a3:2797_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:2797_1: “tadā satta bhātaro ime keḷisīlakā bhikkhū ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2801_0: Paṇītanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2801_1: Tañhi satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo”ti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0513a3:2801_2: bhante”ti vutte “na kho bhikkhu idāneva lolo,
atk-s0513a3:2801_4: lolatāya pana bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthigavāssapurisakuṇapehi atitto ‘ito uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī’ti araññaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2802_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā araññe lūkhatiṇabījāhāro vasi.
atk-s0513a3:2802_1: Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ eko lolakāko hatthikuṇapādīhi atitto “ito uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a3:2802_2: phalāphalaṃ khādanto bodhisattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vaṭṭako ativiya thūlasarīro,
atk-s0513a3:2802_4: etassa gocaraṃ pucchitvā taṃ khāditvā ahampi thūlo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā bodhisattassa uparibhāge sākhāya nilīyitvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi “bho vaṭṭaka,
atk-s0513a3:2802_7: Bodhisatto tena pucchito tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2805_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, kiso tvamasi vāyasā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2807_0: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā kāko tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2813_0: Laddho piṇḍo na pīṇeti, kiso tenasmi vaṭṭaka.
atk-s0513a3:2816_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, thūlo tvamasi vaṭṭakā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2817_0: Tattha daḷhiyanti evarūpassa mayhaṃ kākassa kuto daḷhībhāvo,
atk-s0513a3:2817_4: Pāpena kammunā laddhoti kākena manussasantakavilumpanasaṅkhātena pāpena kammena laddho piṇḍo.
atk-s0513a3:2817_8: Idaṃ kāko bodhisattaṃ “paṇītabhojanaṃ khādatī”ti saññī hutvāpi vaṭṭakānaṃ gahitagocaraṃ pucchanto āha.
atk-s0513a3:2818_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto attano thūlabhāvakāraṇaṃ kathento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2825_4: Adūragamanena cāti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne madhuraṃ labhissāmī”ti cintetvā avidūragamanena ca.
atk-s0513a3:2825_5: Laddhāladdhenāti lūkhaṃ vā hotu paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0513a3:2825_7: Thūlo tenasmīti tena catubbidhena kāraṇena thūlo asmi.
atk-s0513a3:2825_9: Appacintasukhassāti āhāracintārahitānaṃ appacintānamariyānaṃ sukhaṃ assatthīti appacintasukho,
atk-s0513a3:2825_11: Susaṅgahitamānassāti “ettakaṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu saṅgahitāhāramānassa.
atk-s0513a3:2825_12: Vuttī susamudānayāti evarūpassa puggalassa jīvitavutti sukhena sakkā samudānetuṃ susamudānayā sunibbattiyā.
atk-s0513a3:2826_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:2827_0: Tadā kāko lolabhikkhu ahosi, vaṭṭako pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2831_0: Cirassaṃ vata passāmīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lolabhikkhuṃyeva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2832_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvato hutvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhino mahānase nīḷapacchiyaṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a3:2832_1: Kākopi tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ katvā tattheva vasatīti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2832_2: Bhattakārako kākapattāni luñcitvā piṭṭhena taṃ makkhetvā ekaṃ kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vijjhitvā kaṇṭhe piḷandhitvā pacchiyaṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0513a3:2832_3: Bodhisatto araññato āgantvā taṃ disvā parihāsaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2835_0: Sukatā massukuttiyā, sobhate vata me sakhā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2840_0: Cirassaṃ nhāpitaṃ laddhā, lomaṃ taṃ ajja hārayi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2841_0: Tattha ahaṃ kammesu byāvaṭoti ahaṃ samma pārāvata,
atk-s0513a3:2841_1: rājakammesu byāvaṭo okāsaṃ alabhanto parūḷhakacchanakhalomo ahosinti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:2844_0: “Yaṃ nu lomaṃ ahāresi, dullabhaṃ laddha kappakaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2845_0: Atha kiñcarahi te samma, kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2846_1: yaṃ tāva dullabhaṃ kappakaṃ labhitvā lomaṃ harāpesi,
atk-s0513a3:2846_3: atha kiñcarahi te vayassa idaṃ kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyatīti.
atk-s0513a3:2850_0: Tesāhaṃ anusikkhāmi, mā tvaṃ maññi davā kataṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2853_0: Kārayissāmi te samma, maṇiñcāpi dadāmi te”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2854_0: Tattha maṇīti evarūpānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ kaṇṭhesu lambati.
atk-s0513a3:2854_2: Mā tvaṃ maññīti tvaṃ pana “etaṃ mayā davā kata”nti mā maññi.
atk-s0513a3:2854_3: Sacepimaṃ pihayasīti sace imaṃ mama kataṃ massukuttiṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
atk-s0513a3:2858_0: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmi, piyaṃ me tavadassana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2859_4: tvaññeva imassa maṇino anucchaviko imissā ca sukatāya massuyā,
atk-s0513a3:2860_0: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto uppatitvā aññattha gato. Kāko tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a3:2861_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:2876_0: Diyaḍḍhakukkūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājovādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2877_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammānusāsako amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2877_1: Rājā agatigamane patiṭṭhāya adhammena rajjaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a3:2877_3: Bodhisatto rājānaṃ ovaditukāmo ekaṃ upamaṃ upadhārento vicarati,
atk-s0513a3:2877_4: rañño uyyāne vāsāgāraṃ vippakataṃ hoti aniṭṭhitacchadanaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2877_6: Rājā kīḷanatthāya uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha vicaritvā taṃ gehaṃ pavisitvā ullokento kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a3:2877_7: attano uparipatanabhayena nikkhamitvā bahi ṭhito puna oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho nissāya kaṇṇikā ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a3:2877_8: kiṃ nissāya gopānasiyo”ti cintetvā bodhisattaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2879_0: “Diyaḍḍhakukkū udayena kaṇṇikā, vidatthiyo aṭṭha parikkhipanti naṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2880_0: Sā siṃsapā, sāramayā apheggukā, kuhiṃ ṭhitā upparito na dhaṃsatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2881_2: Parikkhipanti nanti taṃ panetaṃ aṭṭha vidatthiyo parikkhipanti,
atk-s0513a3:2882_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “laddhā dāni me rañño ovādatthāya upamā”ti cintetvā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a3:2884_0: “Yā tiṃsati sāramayā anujjukā, parikiriya gopānasiyo samaṃ ṭhitā;
atk-s0513a3:2885_0: Tāhi susaṅgahitā balasā pīḷitā, samaṃ ṭhitā upparito na dhaṃsati.
atk-s0513a3:2887_0: “Evampi mittehi daḷhehi paṇḍito, abhejjarūpehi sucīhi mantibhi;
atk-s0513a3:2888_0: Susaṅgahīto siriyā na dhaṃsati, gopānasībhāravahāva kaṇṇikā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2889_0: Tattha yā tiṃsati sāramayāti yā etā sārarukkhamayā tiṃsati gopānasiyo.
atk-s0513a3:2889_3: Balasā pīḷitāti tāhi tāhi gopānasīhi balena pīḷitā suṭṭhu saṅgahitā ekābaddhā hutvā.
atk-s0513a3:2889_7: Gopānasībhāravahāva kaṇṇikāti yathā gopānasīnaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā kaṇṇikā na dhaṃsati na patati,
atk-s0513a3:2889_8: evaṃ rājāpi vuttappakārehi mantīhi abhijjahadayehi susaṅgahito sirito na dhaṃsati na patati na parihāyati.
atk-s0513a3:2890_0: Rājā bodhisatte kathenteyeva attano kiriyaṃ sallakkhetvā kaṇṇikāya asati gopānasiyo na tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0513a3:2890_3: evameva adhammiko rājā attano mittāmacce ca balakāye ca brāhmaṇagahapatike ca asaṅgaṇhanto tesu bhijjantesu tehi asaṅgahito issariyā dhaṃsati,
atk-s0513a3:2890_5: Athassa tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇākāratthāya mātuluṅgaṃ āhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2890_9: imaṃ khādituṃ ajānantā tittakaṃ vā karonti ambilaṃ vā,
atk-s0513a3:2890_10: jānantā pana paṇḍitā tittakaṃ hāretvā ambilaṃ anīharitvā mātuluṅgarasaṃ anāsetvāva khādantī”ti rañño
atk-s0513a3:2890_11: imāya upamāya dhanasaṅgharaṇūpāyaṃ dassento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2892_0: “Kharattacaṃ bellaṃ yathāpi satthavā, anāmasantopi karoti tittakaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2893_0: Samāharaṃ sāduṃ karoti patthiva, asāduṃ kayirā tanubandhamuddharaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2896_0: Dhammānuvattī paṭipajjamāno, sa phāti kayirā aviheṭhayaṃ para”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2897_5: Anāmasantoti bahitacaṃ tanukampi atacchanto idaṃ phalaṃ tittakaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a3:2897_6: Samāharanti samāharanto bahitacaṃ tacchanto anto ca ambilaṃ anīharanto taṃ sāduṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a3:2897_8: Tanubandhamuddharanti tanukaṃ pana tacaṃ uddharanto sabbaso tittakassa anapanītattā taṃ asādumeva kayirā.
atk-s0513a3:2897_9: Evanti evaṃ paṇḍito rājāpi asāhasaṃ sāhasiyā taṇhāya vasaṃ agacchanto agatigamanaṃ pahāya raṭṭhaṃ apīḷetvā
atk-s0513a3:2897_10: upacikānaṃ vammikavaḍḍhananiyāmena madhukarānaṃ reṇuṃ gahetvā madhukaraṇaniyāmena ca dhanaṃ saṅgharanto –
atk-s0513a3:2900_0: Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ rājadhammānaṃ anuvattanena dhammānuvattī hutvā paṭipajjamāno so attano ca paresañca
atk-s0513a3:2901_0: Rājā bodhisattena saddhiṃ mantento pokkharaṇītīraṃ gantvā supupphitaṃ bālasūriyavaṇṇaṃ udakena anupalittaṃ padumaṃ disvā āha – “sahāya,
atk-s0513a3:2901_1: imaṃ padumaṃ udake sañjātameva udakena alimpamānaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2901_3: raññā nāma evarūpena bhavitabba”nti ovadanto imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a3:2904_0: Padumaṃ yathā agginikāsiphālimaṃ, na kaddamo na rajo na vāri limpati.
atk-s0513a3:2907_0: Na limpati kammakilesa tādiso, jātaṃ yathā pokkharaṇīsu ambuja”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2908_2: Agginikāsiphālimanti agginikāsinā sūriyena phālitaṃ vikasitanti attho.
atk-s0513a3:2908_3: Na kaddamo na rajo na vāri limpatīti neva kaddamo na rajo na udakaṃ limpati,
atk-s0513a3:2908_9: Vohārasucinti porāṇakehi dhammikarājūhi likhāpetvā ṭhapitavinicchayavohāre suciṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2908_12: Visuddhakammantanti teneva asāhasikaṭṭhena visuddhakammantaṃ saccavādiṃ nikkodhaṃ majjhattaṃ tulābhūtaṃ lokassa.
atk-s0513a3:2908_14: Na limpati kammakilesa tādisoti taṃ rājānaṃ pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādoti ayaṃ kammakileso na allīyati.
atk-s0513a3:2908_17: Tādiso hi rājā yathā pokkharaṇīsu jātaṃ padumaṃ anupalittaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2909_0: Rājā bodhisattassa ovādaṃ sutvā tato paṭṭhāya dhammena rajjaṃ kārento dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2910_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:2914_0: Yathā cāpo ninnamatīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto vipakkhasevakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2915_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sīho hutvā sīhiyā saddhiṃ saṃvasanto dve potake labhi –
atk-s0513a3:2915_5: Manojo vanamahiṃsādayo vadhitvā maṃsaṃ āharitvā mātāpitaro ca bhaginiñca pajāpatiñca poseti.
atk-s0513a3:2915_6: So ekadivasaṃ gocarabhūmiyaṃ giriyaṃ nāma siṅgālaṃ palāyituṃ appahontaṃ urena nipannaṃ disvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2915_9: upaṭṭhahassū”ti taṃ gahetvā attano vasanaguhaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0513a3:2915_11: siṅgālā nāma dussīlā pāpadhammā akicce niyojenti,
atk-s0513a3:2915_12: mā etaṃ attano santike karī”ti vāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:2916_0: Athekadivasaṃ siṅgālo assamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo manojaṃ āha – “sāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2916_1: amhehi ṭhapetvā assamaṃsaṃ aññaṃ akhāditapubbaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:2916_6: So tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ assānaṃ nadiyā nhānavelāyaṃ gantvā ekaṃ assaṃ gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā vegena attano guhādvārameva āgato.
atk-s0513a3:2916_9: rājāno ca nāma anekamāyā kusalehi dhanuggahehi vijjhāpenti,
atk-s0513a3:2916_11: ito paṭṭhāya mā assaṃ gaṇhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:2916_13: “Sīho asse gaṇhātī”ti sutvā rājā antonagareyeva assānaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2916_15: Rājā assasālaṃ kāretvā antosālāyameva tiṇodakaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2917_0: Rājā ekaṃ akkhaṇavedhiṃ dhanuggahaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi tāta,
atk-s0513a3:2917_2: So “sakkomī”ti vatvā pākāraṃ nissāya sīhassa āgamanamagge aṭṭakaṃ kāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2917_3: Sīho āgantvā bahisusāne siṅgālaṃ ṭhapetvā assagahaṇatthāya nagaraṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0513a3:2917_4: Dhanuggaho āgamanakāle “atitikhiṇo vego”ti sīhaṃ avijjhitvā assaṃ gahetvā gamanakāle garubhāratāya olīnavegaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2917_8: Dhanuggaho taṃ vijjhitvā asani viya jiyaṃ pothesi.
atk-s0513a3:2917_9: Siṅgālo sīhassa ca jiyāya ca saddaṃ sutvā “sahāyo me dhanuggahena vijjhitvā mārito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:2917_10: matakena hi saddhiṃ vissāso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:2917_11: idāni mama pakatiyā vasanavanameva gamissāmī”ti attanāva saddhiṃ sallapanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2920_0: Haññate nūna manojo, migarājā sakhā mama.
atk-s0513a3:2923_0: Netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2924_2: Netādisāti evarūpā matakā sahāyā nāma na honti.
atk-s0513a3:2924_3: Labbhā meti jīvato mama sahāyo nāma sakkā laddhuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2925_0: Sīhopi ekavegena gantvā assaṃ guhādvāre pātetvā sayampi maritvā pati.
atk-s0513a3:2925_1: Athassa ñātakā nikkhamitvā taṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ pahāramukhehi paggharitalohitaṃ pāpajanasevitāya jīvitakkhayaṃ pattaṃ addasaṃsu,
atk-s0513a3:2925_2: disvā cassa mātā pitā bhaginī pajāpatīti paṭipāṭiyā catasso gāthā bhāsiṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:2931_0: Manojaṃ passa semānaṃ, acchannaṃ samhi lohite.
atk-s0513a3:2934_0: Yo ve hitānaṃ vacanaṃ, na karoti atthadassinaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2936_0: “Evañca so hoti tato ca pāpiyo, yo uttamo adhamajanūpasevī;
atk-s0513a3:2938_0: Tattha accantaṃ sukhamedhatīti na ciraṃ sukhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a3:2938_1: Giriyassānusāsanīti ayaṃ evarūpā giriyassānusāsanīti garahanto āha.
atk-s0513a3:2941_0: “Nihīyati puriso nihīnasevī, na ca hāyetha kadāci tulyasevī;
atk-s0513a3:2942_0: Seṭṭhamupagamaṃ udeti khippaṃ, tasmāttanā uttaritaraṃ bhajethā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2943_1: nihīnasevī nāma manojo sīho viya nihīyati parihāyati vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0513a3:2943_2: Tulyasevīti sīlādīhi attanā sadisaṃ sevamāno na hāyati,
atk-s0513a3:2943_5: Udeti khippanti sīghameva sīlādīhi guṇehi udeti,
atk-s0513a3:2944_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:2949_0: Rājā te bhattanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2950_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto duggatagahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:2950_2: So vayappatto bhatiṃ katvā mātāpitaro posetvā pitari kālakate mātaraṃ poseti.
atk-s0513a3:2950_3: Tasmiṃ pana kāle bārāṇasirājā migavittako ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2950_4: So ekadivasaṃ mahantena parivārena yojanadviyojanamattaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā “yassa ṭhitaṭṭhānena migo palāyati,
atk-s0513a3:2950_5: so imaṃ nāma jito”ti sabbesaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2950_6: Amaccā rañño dhuvamaggaṭṭhāne koṭṭhakaṃ chādetvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2950_7: Manussehi migānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni parivāretvā unnādentehi uṭṭhāpitesu migesu eko eṇimigo rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a3:2950_9: Uggahitamāyo migo saraṃ mahāphāsukābhimukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ ñatvā parivattitvā sarena viddho viya hutvā pati.
atk-s0513a3:2950_13: So migaṃ anubandhitvā kilantakāle khaggena dvidhā chinditvā ekasmiṃ daṇḍake laggitvā kājaṃ vahanto viya
atk-s0513a3:2950_14: āgacchanto “thokaṃ vissamissāmī”ti maggasamīpe ṭhitaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagantvā nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a3:2951_0: Tasmiṃ pana vaṭarukkhe nibbatto maghadevo nāma yakkho tattha paviṭṭhe vessavaṇassa santikā khādituṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a3:2951_1: So rājānaṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantaṃ “tiṭṭha bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a3:2951_5: Rājā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā “kiṃ ajjeva maṃ khādissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2951_8: Rājā “imaṃ ajja migaṃ khāditvā maṃ vissajjehi,
atk-s0513a3:2951_9: ahaṃ te sve paṭṭhāya ekāya bhattapātiyā saddhiṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ pesessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2951_15: So nagaraṃ pavisitvā tamatthaṃ ekassa atthacarakassa amaccassa kathetvā “idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:2952_0: Amacco “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā devasikaṃ bandhanāgārato manussaṃ nīharitvā bhattapātiṃ gahetvā kañci ajānāpetvāva yakkhassa pesesi.
atk-s0513a3:2952_6: hatthikkhandhe sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapetvā ‘ko imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā yakkhassa bhattaṃ ādāya gamissatī’ti bheriṃ carāpemā”ti vatvā tathā kāresi.
atk-s0513a3:2952_7: Atha taṃ sutvā bodhisatto cintesi “ahaṃ bhatiyā māsakaḍḍhamāsakaṃ saṅgharitvā kicchena mātaraṃ posemi,
atk-s0513a3:2952_8: imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā mātu datvā yakkhassa santikaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2952_14: na mama attho dhanenā”ti dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre taṃ anāpucchitvāva “āharatha, ayya, sahassaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2952_15: ahaṃ bhattaṃ harissāmī”ti sahassaṃ gahetvā mātu datvā “amma,
atk-s0513a3:2952_17: ahaṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā mahājanassa sotthiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2952_18: ajjeva tava assukilinnamukhaṃ hāsāpentova āgacchissāmī”ti mātaraṃ vanditvā rājapurisehi saddhiṃ rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2953_6: so yakkho attano rukkhamūle bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitake khādituṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a3:2953_7: ahaṃ etassa santakabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭhatvā pādukāsu ṭhassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2953_11: yakkho attano rukkhacchāyāya ṭhitake khādituṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a3:2953_12: ahaṃ tassa rukkhacchāyāya aṭṭhatvā chattacchāyāya ṭhassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2953_20: mādisassa nāma paṇḍitassa purisassa mattikapātiyā lūkhabhojanaṃ harituṃ ananucchavika”nti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a3:2953_21: tātā”ti rājā sabbaṃ dāpetvā tassa veyyāvaccakare paṭipādesi.
atk-s0513a3:2954_2: ajjāhaṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā tumhākaṃ sotthiṃ katvā āgamissāmī”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā upakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā tattha
atk-s0513a3:2954_3: gantvā manusse rukkhassāvidūre ṭhapetvā suvaṇṇapādukaṃ āruyha khaggaṃ sannayhitvā setacchattaṃ matthake
atk-s0513a3:2954_4: katvā kañcanapātiyā bhattaṃ gahetvā yakkhassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2954_5: Yakkho maggaṃ olokento taṃ disvā “ayaṃ puriso na aññesu divasesu āgamananiyāmena eti,
atk-s0513a3:2954_7: Bodhisattopi rukkhasamīpaṃ gantvā asituṇḍena bhattapātiṃ antochāyāya karitvā chāyāya pariyante ṭhito paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0513a3:2959_0: Taṃ sutvā yakkho “imaṃ purisaṃ vañcetvā antochāyāya paviṭṭhaṃ khādissāmī”ti cintetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2962_0: Tvañca māṇava bhikkhā ca, ubho bhakkhā bhavissathā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2963_0: Tattha bhikkhanti mama nibaddhabhikkhaṃ. Sūpitanti sūpasampannaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2969_0: “Laddhāya yakkhā tava niccabhikkhaṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2970_0: Bhikkhañca te āhariyo naro idha, sudullabho hehiti bhakkhite mayī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2971_0: Tattha thullamatthanti appakena kāraṇena mahantaṃ atthaṃ jahissasīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a3:2971_1: Nāharissantīti ito paṭṭhāya maraṇasaññino hutvā na āharissanti,
atk-s0513a3:2971_2: atha tvaṃ milātasākho viya rukkho nirāhāro dubbalo bhavissasīti.
atk-s0513a3:2971_7: idaṃ tava niccabhikkhaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ rasena upetaṃ laddhāgamanaṃ devasikaṃ te āgacchissati.
atk-s0513a3:2971_10: “sace tvaṃ imaṃ bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgataṃ maṃ bhakkhasi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_11: athevaṃ mayi bhakkhite bhikkhañca te āharaṇako añño naro idha sudullabho bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:2971_13: Mādiso hi bārāṇasiyaṃ añño paṇḍitamanusso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_14: mayi pana khādite sutanupi nāma yakkhena khādito,
atk-s0513a3:2971_15: aññassa kassa so lajjissatī”ti bhattāharaṇakaṃ na labhissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_16: atha te ito paṭṭhāya bhojanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:2971_17: amhākampi rājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ na labhissasi. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a3:2971_19: Sace panidaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā maṃ pahiṇissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_20: ahaṃ te rañño kathetvā nibaddhaṃ bhattaṃ pesessāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_21: attānampi ca te khādituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_22: ahampi tava santike ṭhāne na ṭhassāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2971_28: ahañhi ajja etadatthameva sajjo hutvā āgatoti.
atk-s0513a3:2972_0: Yakkho “yuttarūpaṃ māṇavo vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā pasannacitto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2975_0: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi mātaraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2978_0: Sotthiṃ passatu te mātā, tvañca passāhi mātara”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2979_2: tathā yo esa tayā bhāsito attho,
atk-s0513a3:2980_0: Yakkhassa kathaṃ sutvā bodhisatto “mama kammaṃ nipphannaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2980_3: rañño ca vacanaṃ kata”nti tuṭṭhacitto yakkhassa anumodanaṃ karonto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2982_0: “Evaṃ yakkha sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0513a3:2983_0: Dhanañca me adhigataṃ, rañño ca vacanaṃ kata”nti. –
atk-s0513a3:2984_1: tvaṃ pubbe akusalakammaṃ katvā kakkhaḷo pharuso paresaṃ lohitamaṃsabhakkho yakkho hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0513a3:2984_2: ito paṭṭhāya pāṇātipātādīni mā karī”ti sīle ca ānisaṃsaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2984_3: dussīlye ca ādīnavaṃ kathetvā yakkhaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “kiṃ te araññavāsena,
atk-s0513a3:2984_4: ehi nagaradvāre taṃ nisīdāpetvā aggabhattalābhiṃ karomī”ti yakkhena saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā khaggādīni yakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2984_5: “Sutanu māṇavo yakkhaṃ gahetvā etī”ti rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2984_6: Rājā amaccaparivuto bodhisattassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā yakkhaṃ nagaradvāre nisīdāpetvā aggabhattalābhinaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2984_7: katvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā bheriṃ carāpetvā nāgare sannipātāpetvā bodhisattassa guṇaṃ kathetvā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2984_8: Ayañca bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2985_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:2989_0: Te kathaṃ nu karissantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2990_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto gijjhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto vuddhe parihīnacakkhuke
atk-s0513a3:2990_1: mātāpitaro gijjhaguhāyaṃ ṭhapetvā gomaṃsādīni āharitvā posesi.
atk-s0513a3:2990_2: Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ susāne eko nesādo aniyametvā gijjhānaṃ pāse oḍḍesi.
atk-s0513a3:2990_3: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto gomaṃsādiṃ pariyesanto susānaṃ paviṭṭho pādena pāse bajjhitvā attano na cintesi,
atk-s0513a3:2990_4: vuddhe parihīnacakkhuke mātāpitaro anussaritvā “kathaṃ nu kho me mātāpitaro yāpessanti,
atk-s0513a3:2990_5: mama baddhabhāvampi ajānantā anāthā nippaccayā pabbataguhāyameva sussitvā marissanti maññe”ti vilapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2993_0: Ahaṃ baddhosmi pāsena, nilīyassa vasaṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2995_0: Atha nesādaputto gijjharājassa paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2997_0: “Kiṃ gijjha paridevasi, kā nu te paridevanā;
atk-s0513a3:2998_0: Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3002_0: Te kathaṃ nu karissanti, ahaṃ vasaṃ gato tavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3006_0: Kasmā jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3010_0: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3013_0: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi ñātake.
atk-s0513a3:3017_0: Nesādaputtena dutiyā, gijjhena tatiyāti imā gāthā paṭipāṭiyā vuttā.
atk-s0513a3:3018_0: Tattha yaṃ nūti yaṃ nu etaṃ loke kathīyati.
atk-s0513a3:3018_2: kuṇapāni avekkhatīti yojanasataṃ atikkamma ṭhitānipi kuṇapāni passati,
atk-s0513a3:3018_4: atha kasmā tvaṃ imaṃ jālañca pāsañca āsajjāpi na bujjhasi,
atk-s0513a3:3019_1: Bharassūti idaṃ so bodhisattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā “paṇḍito gijjharājā paridevanto na attano paridevati,
atk-s0513a3:3019_4: vatvā ca pana piyacittena muducittena pāsaṃ mocesi.
atk-s0513a3:3020_0: Athassa bodhisatto maraṇamukhā pamutto sukhito anumodanaṃ karonto osānagāthaṃ vatvā mukhapūraṃ maṃsaṃ ādāya mātāpitūnaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3021_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:3022_0: Tadā nesādaputto channo ahosi, mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni, gijjharājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:3026_0: Anutīracārī bhaddanteti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3026_1: So hi sāsane pabbajitvā appicchatādiguṇe pahāya mahātaṇho ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3026_2: Vassūpanāyikāya dve tayo vihāre pariggahetvā ekasmiṃ chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā ekasmiṃ kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā udakatumbaṃ vā ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ sayaṃ vasati.
atk-s0513a3:3026_3: So ekasmiṃ janapadavihāre vassaṃ upagantvā “bhikkhūhi nāma appicchehi bhavitabba”nti ākāse candaṃ uṭṭhāpento
atk-s0513a3:3026_5: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū manāpāni pattacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā mattikāpattāni ceva paṃsukūlacīvarāni ca gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:3026_6: So tāni attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vutthavasso pavāretvā yānakaṃ pūretvā jetavanaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0513a3:3026_7: ekassa araññavihārassa piṭṭhibhāge pāde valliyā palibuddho “addhā ettha kiñci laddhabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a3:3026_9: Tattha pana dve mahallakā bhikkhū vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:3026_10: Te dve ca thūlasāṭake ekañca sukhumakambalaṃ labhitvā bhājetuṃ asakkontā taṃ disvā “thero no bhājetvā dassatī”ti tuṭṭhacittā “mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:3026_14: So “sādhu bhājessāmī”ti dve thūlasāṭake dvinnampi bhājetvā “ayaṃ amhākaṃ vinayadharānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti kambalaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a3:3027_0: Tepi therā kambale sālayā teneva saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā vinayadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “labbhati nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:3027_2: Bhikkhū upanandattherena ābhataṃ pattacīvararāsiṃ disvā “mahāpuññosi tvaṃ āvuso,
atk-s0513a3:3027_5: iminā me upāyena idaṃ laddha”nti sabbaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3027_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a3:3027_13: parassa paṭipadaṃ kathentena nāma bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ attano anucchavikaṃ katvā pacchā paro ovaditabbo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3030_5: pubbepesa imesaṃ santakaṃ vilumpiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:3031_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto nadītīre rukkhadevatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3031_1: Tadā eko siṅgālo māyāviṃ nāma bhariyaṃ gahetvā nadītīre ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasi.
atk-s0513a3:3031_2: Athekadivasaṃ siṅgālī siṅgālaṃ āha “dohaḷo me sāmi, uppanno,
atk-s0513a3:3031_5: āharissāmi te”ti nadītīre caranto valliyā pāde palibujjhitvā anutīrameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3031_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gambhīracārī ca anutīracārī cāti dve uddā macche pariyesantā tīre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:3031_7: Tesu gambhīracārī mahantaṃ rohitamacchaṃ disvā vegena udake pavisitvā taṃ naṅguṭṭhe gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a3:3031_9: So gambhīracārī uddo “mahāmaccho ubhinnampi no pahossati,
atk-s0513a3:3031_10: ehi me sahāyo hohī”ti itarena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3034_0: Mahā me gahito maccho, so maṃ harati vegasā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3035_0: Tattha sahāyamanudhāva manti sahāya anudhāva maṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3035_5: evaṃ maṃ naṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍe gahetvā tvaṃ anudhāvāti.
atk-s0513a3:3040_0: Tattha thāmasāti thāmena. Uddharissāmīti nīharissāmi. Supaṇṇo uragāmivāti garuḷo sappaṃ viya.
atk-s0513a3:3041_0: Atha dvepi te ekato hutvā rohitamacchaṃ nīharitvā thale ṭhapetvā māretvā “tvaṃ bhājehi,
atk-s0513a3:3041_1: tvaṃ bhājehī”ti kalahaṃ katvā bhājetuṃ asakkontā ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:3041_2: Tasmiṃ kāle siṅgālo taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0513a3:3041_3: Te taṃ disvā ubhopi paccuggamanaṃ katvā “ayaṃ, samma,
atk-s0513a3:3041_5: taṃ no bhājetuṃ asakkontānaṃ vivādo uppanno,
atk-s0513a3:3041_6: samabhāgaṃ no bhājetvā dehī”ti tatiyaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:3045_0: Tattha dabbhapupphāti dabbhapupphasamānavaṇṇatāya taṃ ālapanti. Medhaganti kalahaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3046_0: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā siṅgālo attano balaṃ dīpento –
atk-s0513a3:3048_0: “Dhammaṭṭhohaṃ pure āsiṃ, bahū aḍḍā me tīritā;
atk-s0513a3:3055_2: tena mayā vinicchaye nisīditvā bahū aḍḍā tīritā,
atk-s0513a3:3055_3: tesaṃ tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikādīnaṃ bahū aḍḍā tīritā vinicchitā,
atk-s0513a3:3055_4: svāhaṃ tumhādisānaṃ samajātikānaṃ catuppadānaṃ aḍḍaṃ tīretuṃ kiṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0513a3:3055_6: sammā maṃ nissāya tumhākaṃ vivādo vūpasammatūti.
atk-s0513a3:3056_0: Evañca pana vatvā macchaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā anutīracāri tvaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0513a3:3056_2: Accāyaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍoti apica ayaṃ majjhimo koṭṭhāso.
atk-s0513a3:3056_4: ime dve koṭṭhāse atikkamitvā ṭhito ayaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍo dhammaṭṭhassa vinicchayasāmikassa mayhaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a3:3057_0: Evaṃ taṃ macchaṃ vibhajitvā “tumhe kalahaṃ akatvā naṅguṭṭhañca sīsañca khādathā”ti vatvā majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3057_2: Te sahassaṃ parājitā viya dummukhā nisīditvā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:3061_0: Tattha cirampīti dve tayo divase sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3062_0: Siṅgālopi “ajja bhariyaṃ rohitamacchaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti tuṭṭhacitto tassā santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3068_0: “Kathaṃ nu thalajo santo, udake macchaṃ parāmasi;
atk-s0513a3:3069_0: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kathaṃ adhigataṃ tayā”ti. –
atk-s0513a3:3071_1: bhadde”ti macchakhaṇḍe purato ṭhapite “kathaṃ nu tvaṃ thalajo samāno udake macchaṃ gaṇhī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:3075_0: Jīnā uddā vivādena, bhuñja māyāvi rohita”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3076_1: ime sattā vivādaṃ karontā vivādaṃ nissāya kisā appamaṃsalohitā honti.
atk-s0513a3:3076_2: Vivādena dhanakkhayāti hiraññasuvaṇṇādīnaṃ dhanānaṃ khayā vivādeneva honti.
atk-s0513a3:3076_3: Dvīsupi vivadantesu eko parājito parājitattā dhanakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a3:3076_5: Jīnā uddāti dve uddāpi vivādeneva imaṃ macchaṃ jīnā,
atk-s0513a3:3076_6: tasmā tvaṃ mayā ābhatassa uppattiṃ mā puccha,
atk-s0513a3:3080_0: Dhammaṭṭhaṃ paṭidhāvati, so hi nesaṃ vināyako;
atk-s0513a3:3082_2: evameva manussesupi yasmiṃ ṭhāne vivādo jāyati,
atk-s0513a3:3082_8: Dhanāpi tatthāti tattha te vivādāpannā dhanatopi jīyanti,
atk-s0513a3:3082_10: daṇḍena ceva jayabhāgaggahaṇena ca rājakoso pavaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0513a3:3083_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:3083_3: tassa kāraṇassa paccakkhakārikā rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3087_0: Paṇṇakaṃ tikhiṇadhāranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3087_1: Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3087_2: bhante”ti vutte “kena ukkaṇṭhāpito”ti vatvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vutte “bhikkhu ayaṃ itthī tuyhaṃ anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a3:3087_3: pubbepi tvaṃ imaṃ nissāya cetasikarogena maranto paṇḍite nissāya jīvitaṃ alatthā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:3088_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ maddavamahārāje rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:3088_2: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā maddavarañño atthadhammānusāsako amacco ahosi,
atk-s0513a3:3088_3: “senakapaṇḍito”ti vutte sakalanagare cando viya sūriyo viya ca paññāyi.
atk-s0513a3:3088_4: Tadā rañño purohitaputto rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgato sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ rañño aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3088_5: disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā gehaṃ gantvā nirāhāro nipajjitvā sahāyakehi puṭṭho tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a3:3088_7: kahaṃ nu kho”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “ahaṃ te imaṃ satta divasāni dammi,
atk-s0513a3:3088_8: sattāhaṃ ghare katvā aṭṭhame divase āneyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:3088_9: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ gehaṃ netvā tāya saddhiṃ abhirami.
atk-s0513a3:3088_10: Te aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhacittā hutvā kañci ajānāpetvā aggadvārena palāyitvā aññassa rañño vijitaṃ agamasuṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3088_13: Rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā nānappakārena vicinantopi tassa gataṭṭhānaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3088_16: Tato paṭṭhāya cassa kucchito lohitaṃ nikkhami,
atk-s0513a3:3089_2: upāyena taṃ tikicchissāmī”ti āyurañca pukkusañcāti dve rañño paṇḍitāmacce āmantetvā “rañño deviyā adassanena
atk-s0513a3:3089_3: cetasikaṃ rogaṃ ṭhapetvā añño rogo natthi,
atk-s0513a3:3089_4: bahūpakāro ca kho pana amhākaṃ rājā,
atk-s0513a3:3089_6: rājaṅgaṇe samajjaṃ kāretvā asiṃ gilituṃ jānantena asiṃ gilāpetvā rājānaṃ sīhapañjare katvā samajjaṃ olokāpessāma,
atk-s0513a3:3089_7: rājā asiṃ gilantaṃ disvā ‘atthi nu kho ito aññaṃ dukkaratara’nti pañhaṃ pucchissati.
atk-s0513a3:3089_9: tvaṃ ‘asukaṃ nāma dadāmīti vacanaṃ ito dukkaratara’nti byākareyyāsi,
atk-s0513a3:3089_13: dadāmīti vatvā adadato sā vācā aphalā hoti,
atk-s0513a3:3089_14: tathārūpaṃ vācaṃ na keci upajīvanti na khādanti na pivanti,
atk-s0513a3:3089_18: ito paraṃ kattabbaṃ ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā samajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a3:3090_0: Atha te tayopi paṇḍitā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:3090_2: taṃ olokentānaṃ dukkhampi na dukkhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a3:3090_3: ehi gacchāmā”ti rājānaṃ netvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā samajjaṃ olokāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3090_4: Bahū janā attano attano jānanakasippaṃ dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3090_5: Eko pana puriso tettiṃsaṅgulaṃ tikhiṇadhāraṃ asiratanaṃ gilati.
atk-s0513a3:3090_6: Rājā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ puriso etaṃ asiṃ gilati,
atk-s0513a3:3090_7: ‘atthi nu kho ito aññaṃ dukkaratara’nti ime paṇḍite pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā āyuraṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3093_0: Parisāyaṃ puriso gilati, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3094_0: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3095_2: Parisāyanti parisamajjhe dhanalobhena ayaṃ puriso gilati.
atk-s0513a3:3095_3: Yadaññanti ito asigilanato yaṃ aññaṃ dukkarataraṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3096_0: Athassa so taṃ kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3099_0: Yo ca vajjā dadāmīti, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3100_0: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3101_1: Taṃ dukkarataranti “dadāmī”ti vacanaṃ tato asigilanato dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3101_2: Sabbaññanti “asukaṃ nāma tava dassāmī”ti vacanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ sabbampi kāraṇaṃ sukaraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3102_0: Rañño āyurapaṇḍitassa vacanaṃ sutvā “asigilanato kira ‘idaṃ nāma dammī’ti vacanaṃ dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3102_2: atidukkaraṃ vata me kata”nti vīmaṃsantasseva hadayasoko thokaṃ tanuttaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a3:3102_3: So tato “parassa imaṃ dammīti vacanato pana aññaṃ dukkarataraṃ atthi nu kho”ti cintetvā pukkusapaṇḍitena saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3105_0: Pukkusaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3106_0: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3107_0: Tattha pañhaṃ atthanti pañhassa atthaṃ byākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a3:3111_0: Yo ca datvā avākayirā, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3112_0: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3113_0: Tattha datvāti “asukaṃ nāma dammī”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā.
atk-s0513a3:3113_1: Avākayirāti taṃ paṭiññātamatthaṃ dadanto tasmiṃ lobhaṃ avākareyya chindeyya,
atk-s0513a3:3113_3: Tatoti tato asigilanato “asukaṃ nāma te dammī”ti vacanato ca tadeva dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3114_0: Rañño taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ ‘purohitaputtassa deviṃ dammī’ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā vācāya anucchavikaṃ katvā taṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3114_1: dukkaraṃ vata me kata”nti parivitakkentassa soko tanukataro jāto.
atk-s0513a3:3114_2: Athassa etadahosi “senakapaṇḍitato añño paṇḍitataro nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:3117_0: Senakaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3118_0: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3121_0: “Dadeyya puriso dānaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3122_0: Yo ca datvā nānutappe, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3123_0: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3124_0: Tattha nānutappeti attano atikantaṃ atimanāpaṃ piyabhaṇḍaṃ parassa datvā “kimatthaṃ mayā idaṃ dinna”nti
atk-s0513a3:3124_1: evaṃ taṃ piyabhaṇḍaṃ ārabbha yo pacchā na tappati na socati,
atk-s0513a3:3124_2: taṃ asigilanato ca “asukaṃ nāma te dammī”ti vacanato ca tassa dānato ca dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3127_0: Ānessāmi sake putte, puttānañhi vadho dukho.
atk-s0513a3:3130_0: Rājāpi bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā sallakkhesi “ahaṃ attano maneneva purohitaputtassa deviṃ datvā sakamanaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a3:3130_5: mayi pana sinehaṃ akatvā palātāya kiṃ tāya mayha”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3130_6: Tassevaṃ cintentassa padumapatte udakabindu viya sabbasoko nivattitvā gato,
atk-s0513a3:3130_8: So nirogo sukhito hutvā bodhisattassa thutiṃ karonto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3133_0: Sabbe pañhe atibhoti, yathā bhāsati senako”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3134_0: Tattha yathā bhāsatīti yathā paṇḍito bhāsati,
atk-s0513a3:3134_1: tathevetaṃ dānaṃ nāma datvā neva anutappitabbanti.
atk-s0513a3:3134_2: Imaṃ panassa thutiṃ katvā tuṭṭho bahuṃ dhanamadāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3135_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:3139_0: Vibbhantacittoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3140_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ janako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a3:3140_3: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā rājānaṃ passi,
atk-s0513a3:3140_7: madhurakatho dhammakathiko hutvā rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā dāne uposathakamme dasasu kusalakammapathesūti
atk-s0513a3:3140_10: Pakkhadivasesu rājā ca uparājādayo ca sabbe sannipatitvā dhammasabhaṃ sajjenti.
atk-s0513a3:3140_11: Mahāsatto sajjitadhammasabhāyaṃ ratanapallaṅkavaragato buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0513a3:3141_0: Atha aññataro mahallakabrāhmaṇo dhanabhikkhaṃ caritvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nikkhipitvā puna “bhikkhaṃ carissāmī”ti gato.
atk-s0513a3:3141_1: Tassa gatakāle taṃ kulaṃ kahāpaṇe vaḷañjesi.
atk-s0513a3:3141_3: Brāhmaṇo kahāpaṇe dātuṃ asakkonto attano dhītaraṃ tassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3141_4: Brāhmaṇo taṃ gahetvā bārāṇasito avidūre ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇagāme vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a3:3141_5: Athassa bhariyā daharatāya kāmesu atittā aññena taruṇabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ micchācāraṃ cari.
atk-s0513a3:3141_12: itthī methunadhammena alaṅkārena vijāyanenāti imehi tīhi na tappati,
atk-s0513a3:3142_1: atittā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nīharitvā vissatthā pāpakammaṃ kātukāmā hutvā ekadivasaṃ dummanā nipajjitvā “kiṃ bhotī”ti vuttā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3142_2: ahaṃ tava gehe kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a3:3142_8: “Sā tassa baddhasattūnañca abaddhasattūnañca cammapasibbakaṃ pūretvā adāsi”.
atk-s0513a3:3142_9: Brāhmaṇo gāmanigamarājadhānīsu caranto satta kahāpaṇasatāni labhitvā “alaṃ me ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāsidāsamūlāyā”ti
atk-s0513a3:3142_10: nivattitvā attano gāmaṃ āgacchanto ekasmiṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne pasibbakaṃ muñcitvā sattuṃ khāditvā pasibbakamukhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3142_12: Athekasmiṃ rukkhasusire eko kaṇhasappo sattugandhaṃ ghāyitvā pasibbakaṃ pavisitvā bhogaṃ ābhujitvā sattuṃ khādanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a3:3142_13: Brāhmaṇo āgantvā pasibbakassa abbhantaraṃ anoloketvā pasibbakaṃ bandhitvā aṃse katvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3142_14: Antarāmagge ekasmiṃ rukkhe nibbattadevatā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3142_19: So olokento devataṃ adisvā bhīto maraṇabhayatajjito rodanto paridevanto bārāṇasinagaradvāraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a3:3143_0: Tadā ca pannarasuposatho hoti alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā bodhisattassa dhammakathanadivaso.
atk-s0513a3:3143_1: Mahājano nānāgandhapupphādihattho vaggavaggo hutvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:3143_3: ajja senakapaṇḍito madhurassarena buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0513a3:3143_4: kiṃ tvampi na jānāsī”ti vutte cintesi “paṇḍito kira dhammakathiko,
atk-s0513a3:3143_6: paṇḍitā kho pana mahantampi sokaṃ harituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0513a3:3143_7: mayāpi tattha gantvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3143_8: So tehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā mahāsattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnāya sarājikāya parisāya pariyante sattupasibbakena
atk-s0513a3:3143_9: khandhagatena dhammāsanato avidūre maraṇabhayatajjito rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3143_10: Mahāsatto ākāsagaṅgaṃ otaranto viya amatavassaṃ vassento viya ca dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a3:3143_11: Mahājano sañjātasomanasso sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ assosi.
atk-s0513a3:3144_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto pasannapañcapasādāni akkhīni ummīletvā samantato parisaṃ olokento taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3144_2: disvā cintesi “ettakā parisā somanassajātā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0513a3:3144_5: tamassa ambilena paharitvā tambamalaṃ viya padumapalāsato udakabinduṃ viya vinivattetvā ettheva naṃ nissokaṃ tuṭṭhamānasaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3144_9: vissattho kathehī”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3147_0: Kiṃ te naṭṭhaṃ kiṃ pana patthayāno, idhāgamā brahme tadiṅgha brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3148_4: sattā nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi socanti paridevanti sattasaṅkhāresu kismiñcideva piyajātike naṭṭhe vā,
atk-s0513a3:3148_7: kiṃ vā pana patthayanto tvaṃ idha āgato,
atk-s0513a3:3149_0: Athassa attano sokakāraṇaṃ kathento brāhmaṇo dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3151_0: “Miyyetha bhariyā vajato mamajja, agacchato maraṇamāha yakkho;
atk-s0513a3:3152_0: Etena dukkhena pavedhitosmi, akkhāhi me senaka etamattha”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3153_2: Yakkhoti antarāmagge ekā rukkhadevatā evamāhāti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:3153_9: Yena me kāraṇena gacchato bhariyāya maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3154_0: Mahāsatto brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā samuddamatthake jālaṃ khipanto viya ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā “imesaṃ sattānaṃ bahūni maraṇakāraṇāni.
atk-s0513a3:3154_11: atisītādīhi vā nānappakārehi vā rogehi upaddutāpi marantiyeva,
atk-s0513a3:3154_12: evaṃ bahūsu maraṇakāraṇesu katarena nu kho kāraṇena ajjesa brāhmaṇo antarāmagge vasanto sayaṃ marissati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_14: Cintento eva brāhmaṇassa khandhe pasibbakaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ pasibbake ekena sappena paviṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3154_15: pavisanto ca paneso imasmiṃ brāhmaṇe pātarāsasamaye sattuṃ khāditvā pasibbakamukhaṃ abandhitvā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3154_16: pātuṃ gate sattugandhena sappo paviṭṭho bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:3154_17: Brāhmaṇopi pānīyaṃ pivitvā āgato sappassa paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajānitvā pasibbakaṃ bandhitvā ādāya pakkanto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_18: sacāyaṃ antarāmagge vasanto sāyaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne “sattuṃ khādissāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ muñcitvā hatthaṃ pavesessati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_19: atha naṃ sappo hatthe ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_23: sā ‘antobhaṇḍaṃ olokessāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ muñcitvā hatthaṃ pavesessati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_24: atha naṃ sappo ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati,
atk-s0513a3:3154_25: idamassa ajja gehaṃ gatassa bhariyāya maraṇakāraṇa”nti upāyakosallañāṇeneva aññāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3155_0: Athassa etadahosi “iminā kaṇhasappena sūrena nibbhayena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3155_1: Ayañhi brāhmaṇassa mahāphāsukaṃ paharantopi pasibbake attano calanaṃ vā phandanaṃ vā na dasseti,
atk-s0513a3:3155_2: evarūpāya parisāya majjhepi attano atthibhāvaṃ na dasseti,
atk-s0513a3:3155_3: tasmā iminā kaṇhasappena sūrena nibbhayena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3155_4: Idampi so upāyakosallañāṇeneva dibbacakkhunā passanto viya aññāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3155_5: Evaṃ sarājikāya parisāya majjhe sappaṃ pasibbakaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā ṭhitapuriso viya mahāsatto upāyakosallañāṇeneva
atk-s0513a3:3155_6: paricchinditvā brāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ kathento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3157_0: “Bahūni ṭhānāni vicintayitvā, yamettha vakkhāmi tadeva saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3158_0: Maññāmi te brāhmaṇa sattubhastaṃ, ajānato kaṇhasappo paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3159_2: Yamettha vakkhāmīti yaṃ te ahaṃ etesu kāraṇesu etaṃ kāraṇaṃ vakkhāmi.
atk-s0513a3:3159_3: Tadeva saccanti tadeva tathaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā kathitasadisaṃ bhavissatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a3:3159_6: Ajānatoti ajānantasseva eko kaṇhasappo paviṭṭhoti maññāmīti.
atk-s0513a3:3160_8: “Sattuṃ khāditvā pānīyaṃ pātuṃ gacchanto pasibbakamukhaṃ bandhi,
atk-s0513a3:3160_16: tava pānīyaṃ pātuṃ gatakāle ajānantasseva te sattugandhena pasibbakaṃ sappo paviṭṭhoti maññāmi,
atk-s0513a3:3160_18: tasmā pasibbakaṃ otāretvā parisamajjhe ṭhapetvā pasibbakamukhaṃ mocetvā paṭikkamma ṭhito ekaṃ daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā pasibbakaṃ tāva pahara,
atk-s0513a3:3160_19: tato patthaṭaphaṇaṃ susūtisaddaṃ katvā nikkhamantaṃ kaṇhasappaṃ disvā nikkaṅkho bhavissatī”ti catutthaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3162_0: “Ādāya daṇḍaṃ parisumbha bhastaṃ, passeḷamūgaṃ uragaṃ dujivhaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3163_0: Chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, bhujaṅgamaṃ passa pamuñca bhasta”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3164_1: Passeḷamūganti eḷaṃ paggharantena mukhena eḷamūgaṃ pasibbakato nikkhamantaṃ dujivhaṃ uragaṃ passa.
atk-s0513a3:3164_2: Chandajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitānīti “atthi nu kho me pasibbake sappo,
atk-s0513a3:3164_3: udāhu natthī”ti kaṅkhameva punappunaṃ uppajjamānāni vicikicchitāni ca ajja chinda,
atk-s0513a3:3164_6: idāneva nikkhamantaṃ bhujaṅgamaṃ passa pamuñca bhastanti.
atk-s0513a3:3165_0: Brāhmaṇo mahāsattassa kathaṃ sutvā saṃviggo bhayappatto tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3165_1: Sappopi sattubhaste daṇḍena pahaṭe pasibbakamukhā nikkhamitvā mahājanaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3167_0: “Saṃviggarūpo parisāya majjhe, so brāhmaṇo sattubhastaṃ pamuñci;
atk-s0513a3:3168_0: Atha nikkhami urago uggatejo, āsīviso sappo phaṇaṃ karitvā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3169_0: Sappassa phaṇaṃ katvā nikkhantakāle “mahāsattassa sabbaññubuddhasseva byākaraṇaṃ ahosī”ti mahājano celukkhepasahassāni pavattesi,
atk-s0513a3:3169_5: Idaṃ pana buddhalīḷāya evarūpassa pañhassa kathanaṃ nāma neva jātiyā balaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3169_9: Paññavā hi puggalo vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggadvāraṃ vivaritvā amatamahānibbānaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0513a3:3170_0: “Paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadanti, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3171_0: Sīlaṃ sirī cāpi satañca dhammo, anvāyikā paññavato bhavantī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a3:3172_0: Evaṃ kathite ca pana mahāsattena pañhe eko ahituṇḍiko sappassa mukhabandhanaṃ katvā sappaṃ gahetvā araññe vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a3:3172_1: Brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā jayāpetvā añjaliṃ paggayha rañño thutiṃ karonto upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3176_1: yo sādhupaññaṃ uttamapaññaṃ senakapaṇḍitaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe piyacakkhūhi passituṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a3:3176_2: tassa rañño janakassa ete icchiticchitakkhaṇe dassanalābhā suladdhalābhā vata,
atk-s0513a3:3176_3: etena laddhesu sabbalābhesu eteva lābhā suladdhalābhā nāmāti.
atk-s0513a3:3177_0: Brāhmaṇopi rañño thutiṃ katvā puna pasibbakato satta kahāpaṇasatāni gahetvā mahāsattassa thutiṃ katvā tuṭṭhidāyaṃ dātukāmo diyaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3178_0: “Vivaṭṭachaddo nusi sabbadassī, ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3180_0: “Imāni me sattasatāni atthi, gaṇhāhi sabbāni dadāmi tuyhaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3181_0: Tayā hi me jīvitamajja laddhaṃ, athopi bhariyāya makāsi sotthi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3182_0: Tattha vivaṭṭachaddo nusi sabbadassīti kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ sabbesu dhammākāresu vivaṭṭachadano vivaṭṭaneyyadhammo sabbaññubuddhoti thutivasena pucchati.
atk-s0513a3:3182_1: Ñāṇaṃ nu te brāhmaṇa bhiṃsarūpanti udāhu asabbaññussapi sato tava ñāṇaṃ ativiya bhiṃsarūpaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya balavanti.
atk-s0513a3:3182_2: Tayā hi meti tayā hi dinnattā ajja mayā jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3182_3: Athopi bhariyāya makāsi sotthinti athopi me bhariyāya tvameva sotthiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3183_3: imāni me satta satāni gaṇhā”ti punappunaṃ bodhisattaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a3:3186_0: Itopi te brahme dadantu vittaṃ, ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3187_3: ito mama pādamūlatopi tuyhaṃ dhanaṃ dadantu.
atk-s0513a3:3187_4: Vittaṃ ādāya tvaṃ gacchāti ito aññāni tīṇi satāni gahetvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ādāya sakanivesanaṃ gaccha.
atk-s0513a3:3188_0: Evañca pana vatvā mahāsatto brāhmaṇassa sahassaṃ pūrāpento kahāpaṇe dāpetvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3188_6: “Tena hi sā aññena saddhiṃ anācāraṃ karontī ‘nibbhayā hutvā karissāmī’ti taṃ pesesi,
atk-s0513a3:3188_8: sā te dukkhena laddhakahāpaṇe attano jārassa dassati,
atk-s0513a3:3188_9: tasmā tvaṃ ujukameva gehaṃ agantvā bahigāme rukkhamūle vā yattha katthaci vā kahāpaṇe ṭhapetvā paviseyyāsī”ti vatvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a3:3188_10: So gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle kahāpaṇe ṭhapetvā sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3188_11: Bhariyāpissa tasmiṃ khaṇe jārena saddhiṃ nisinnā ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3188_13: Sā tassa saddaṃ sallakkhetvā dīpaṃ nibbāpetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā brāhmaṇe anto paviṭṭhe itaraṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0513a3:3188_14: dvāramūle ṭhapetvā gehaṃ pavisitvā pasibbake kiñci adisvā “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3188_15: kiṃ te bhikkhaṃ caritvā laddha”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:3188_22: So nikkhamitvā attanā ṭhapitaṃ viya gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a3:3189_0: Brāhmaṇo punadivase gantvā kahāpaṇe apassanto bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3189_5: Mahāsatto tāya jārassa ācikkhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi pana te brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3189_10: Athassa mahāsatto sattannaṃ divasānaṃ paribbayaṃ dāpetvā “gaccha paṭhamadivase tava satta,
atk-s0513a3:3189_11: bhariyāya te sattāti cuddasa brāhmaṇe nimantetvā bhojetha,
atk-s0513a3:3189_12: punadivasato paṭṭhāya ekekaṃ hāpetvā sattame divase tava ekaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3189_13: bhariyāya te ekanti dve brāhmaṇe nimantetvā bhariyāya te satta divase nimantitabrāhmaṇassa nibaddhaṃ āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā mayhaṃ ārocehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:3190_0: Bodhisatto tena saddhiṃ purise pesetvā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āharāpetvā “asukarukkhamūlato te imassa brāhmaṇassa santakaṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ gahita”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:3190_14: Bodhisatto manusse pesetvā brāhmaṇassa kahāpaṇe ca brāhmaṇiñca āharāpetvā corabrāhmaṇassa hatthato kahāpaṇe
atk-s0513a3:3190_15: brāhmaṇassa dāpetvā itarassa rājāṇaṃ kāretvā nagarā nīharāpetvā brāhmaṇiyāpi rājāṇaṃ kāretvā brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a3:3190_16: mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā attanoyeva santike vasāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:3191_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:3195_0: Yeme ahaṃ na jānāmīti idaṃ satthā āḷaviṃ nissāya aggāḷave cetiye viharanto kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3195_3: porāṇakapaṇḍitā pubbe anuppanne buddhe bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitvā rājūhi pavāritāpi ‘yācanā nāma paresaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3195_4: appiyā amanāpā’ti na yāciṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:3196_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ nigame brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:3196_2: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā aparabhāge kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a3:3196_3: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññāsamāpattiyo nibbattetvā himavantapadese ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya
atk-s0513a3:3196_4: manussapathaṃ otaritvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya caranto rājaṅgaṇaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3196_5: Rājā tassācāravihāre pasīditvā taṃ nimantāpetvā pāsādatale pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā bhojanāvasāne
atk-s0513a3:3196_6: anumodanaṃ sutvā pasanno paṭiññaṃ gahetvā mahāsattaṃ rājuyyāne vasāpesi,
atk-s0513a3:3196_7: divasassa ca dve tayo vāre upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3196_8: So ekadivasaṃ dhammakathāya pasanno rajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā “yena vo attho,
atk-s0513a3:3196_10: Bodhisatto “idaṃ nāma me dehī”ti na vadati.
atk-s0513a3:3196_14: So ekadivasaṃ cintesi “aññe yācanakavanibbakā ‘idañcidañca amhākaṃ dehī’ti maṃ yācanti,
atk-s0513a3:3196_15: ayyo pana aṭṭhiseno pavāritakālato paṭṭhāya na kiñci yācati,
atk-s0513a3:3196_18: So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno aññesaṃ yācanakāraṇaṃ tassa ca ayācanakāraṇaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3199_0: Te maṃ saṅgamma yācanti, kasmā maṃ tvaṃ na yācasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3200_4: yeme vanibbake ahaṃ nāmagottajātikulappadesena “ime nāmete”tipi na jānāmi,
atk-s0513a3:3200_6: tvaṃ pana kasmā maṃ kiñci na yācasīti.
atk-s0513a3:3204_0: Tasmāhaṃ taṃ na yācāmi, mā me videssanā ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3205_0: Tattha yācako appiyo hotīti yo hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:3205_2: so mātāpitūnampi mittāmaccādīnampi appiyo hoti amanāpo.
atk-s0513a3:3205_8: so mātāpitaro ādiṃ katvā adadamāno puggalo yācakassa appiyo hotīti.
atk-s0513a3:3205_10: yācitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adadantopi yācakassa appiyo hoti,
atk-s0513a3:3205_12: Mā me videssanā ahūti sace hi ahaṃ yāceyyameva,
atk-s0513a3:3205_14: sā me tava santikā uppannā videssanā,
atk-s0513a3:3205_18: evaṃ sabbathāpi mā me videssanā ahu,
atk-s0513a3:3205_19: mā no ubhinnampi mettā bhijjīti etamatthaṃ sampassanto ahaṃ taṃ na kiñci yācāmīti.
atk-s0513a3:3206_0: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā rājā tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:3208_0: “Yo ve yācanajīvāno, kāle yācaṃ na yācati;
atk-s0513a3:3209_0: Parañca puññā dhaṃseti, attanāpi na jīvati.
atk-s0513a3:3212_0: Parañca puññaṃ labbheti, attanāpi ca jīvati.
atk-s0513a3:3215_0: Brahmacāri piyo mesi, vada tvaṃ bhaññamicchasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3216_3: aṭṭhisena yo yācanena jīvamāno dhammiko samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yācitabbayuttapattakāle kiñcideva yācitabbaṃ na yācati,
atk-s0513a3:3216_4: so parañca dāyakaṃ puññā dhaṃseti parihāpeti,
atk-s0513a3:3216_6: Puññaṃ labbhetīti kāle pana yācitabbaṃ yācanto parañca puññaṃ adhigameti,
atk-s0513a3:3216_8: Na vedessantīti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi “mā me videssanā ahū”ti,
atk-s0513a3:3216_10: Sappaññā hi dānañca dānaphalañca jānantā paṇḍitā yācake āgate disvā na dessanti na kujjhanti,
atk-s0513a3:3216_18: tasmā varaṃ tvaṃ maṃ vadehi yācāhiyeva.
atk-s0513a3:3217_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto raññā rajjenāpi pavārito neva kiñci yāci.
atk-s0513a3:3217_1: Rañño pana evaṃ attano ajjhāsaye kathite mahāsattopi pabbajitapaṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a3:3217_2: yācanā hi nāmesā kāmabhogīnaṃ gihīnaṃ āciṇṇā,
atk-s0513a3:3217_4: pabbajitena pana pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya gihīhi asamānaparisuddhājīvena bhavitabba”nti pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ dassento chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3219_0: “Na ve yācanti sappaññā, dhīro ca veditumarahati;
atk-s0513a3:3220_0: Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3221_0: Tattha sappaññāti buddhā ca buddasāvakā ca bodhiyā paṭipannā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitā bodhisattā ca sabbepi sappaññā ca susīlā ca,
atk-s0513a3:3221_1: ete evarūpā sappaññā “amhākaṃ idañcidañca dethā”ti na yācanti.
atk-s0513a3:3221_2: Dhīro ca veditumarahatīti upaṭṭhāko pana dhīro paṇḍito gilānakāle ca agilānakāle ca yena yenattho,
atk-s0513a3:3221_3: taṃ sabbaṃ sayameva vedituṃ jānituṃ arahati.
atk-s0513a3:3221_4: Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhantīti ariyā pana vācaṃ abhinditvā yenatthikā honti,
atk-s0513a3:3221_6: neva kāyaṅgaṃ vā vācaṅgaṃ vā kopenti.
atk-s0513a3:3221_7: Kāyavikāraṃ dassetvā nimittaṃ karonto hi kāyaṅgaṃ kopeti nāma,
atk-s0513a3:3221_10: Esā ariyāna yācanāti esā kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ akopetvā bhikkhāya tiṭṭhamānā ariyānaṃ yācanā nāma.
atk-s0513a3:3222_1: yadi sappañño upaṭṭhāko attanāva ñatvā kulūpakassa dātabbaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a3:3222_2: ahampi tumhākaṃ idañcidañca dammī”ti vadanto sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3224_0: “Dadāmi te brāhmaṇa rohiṇīnaṃ, gavaṃ sahassaṃ saha puṅgavena;
atk-s0513a3:3225_0: Ariyo hi ariyassa kathaṃ na dajjā, sutvāna gāthā tava dhammayuttā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3226_1: Gavaṃ sahassanti khīradadhiādimadhurarasaparibhogatthāya evarūpānaṃ gunnaṃ sahassaṃ tuyhaṃ dammi,
atk-s0513a3:3226_5: Kathaṃ na dajjāti kena kāraṇena na dadeyya.
atk-s0513a3:3227_3: Rājā tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3228_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a3:3232_0: Yattha verī nivasatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattassa pathavipavesanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3232_1: Tasmiñhi pathaviṃ paviṭṭhe dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a3:3232_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a3:3233_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pañcasatakapiparivāro rājuyyāne vasi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_1: Devadattopi kapiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pañcasatakapiparivāro tattheva vasi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_2: Athekadivasaṃ purohite uyyānaṃ gantvā nhatvā alaṅkaritvā nikkhamante eko lolakapi puretaraṃ gantvā rājuyyānadvāre
atk-s0513a3:3233_3: toraṇamatthake nisīditvā tassa matthake vaccapiṇḍaṃ pātetvā puna uddhaṃ olokentassa mukhe pātesi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_5: jānissāmi tumhākaṃ kattabba”nti makkaṭe santajjetvā puna nhatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_6: Tena veraṃ gahetvā makkaṭānaṃ santajjitabhāvaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3233_7: So “verīnaṃ nivasanaṭṭhāne nāma vasituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a3:3233_8: sabbopi kapigaṇo palāyitvā aññattha gacchatū”ti kapisahassassapi ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_9: Dubbacakapi attano parivāramakkaṭe gahetvā “pacchā jānissāmī”ti tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_10: Bodhisatto attano parivāraṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a3:3233_11: Athekadivasaṃ ekissā vīhikoṭṭikāya dāsiyā ātape pasāritavīhiṃ khādanto eko eḷako ummukkena pahāraṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a3:3233_12: ādittasarīro palāyanto ekissā hatthisālaṃ nissāya tiṇakuṭiyā kuṭṭe sarīraṃ ghaṃsi.
atk-s0513a3:3234_1: Atha naṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā nisinnaṃ rājā āha “ācariya,
atk-s0513a3:3234_11: Rājā “uyyāne makkaṭe māretvā vasaṃ ānethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:3234_12: Dhanuggahā gantvā pañcasatepi makkaṭe vijjhitvā māresuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3234_13: Eko pana jeṭṭhakamakkaṭo palāyanto sarapahāraṃ labhitvāpi tattheva apatitvā bodhisattassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā pati.
atk-s0513a3:3234_14: Vānarā “amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā mato”ti tassa pahāraṃ laddhā matabhāvaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3234_15: So gantvā kapigaṇamajjhe nisinno “paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akatvā veriṭṭhāne vasantā nāma evaṃ vinassantī”ti kapigaṇassa ovādavasena imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:3236_0: “Yattha verī nivasati, na vase tattha paṇḍito;
atk-s0513a3:3237_0: Ekarattaṃ dvirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisu.
atk-s0513a3:3240_0: Ekassa kapino hetu, yūthassa anayo kato.
atk-s0513a3:3243_0: Sacittassa vasaṃ gantvā, sayethāyaṃ yathā kapi.
atk-s0513a3:3252_0: Ubhinnamatthaṃ carati, attano ca parassa ca.
atk-s0513a3:3255_0: Gaṇaṃ vā parihare dhīro, eko vāpi paribbaje”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3256_2: yo poso lahucittassa mittassa vā ñātino vā anuvidhīyati anuvattati,
atk-s0513a3:3256_3: tassa posassa anuvidhīyato so lahucitto diso hoti,
atk-s0513a3:3256_5: Ekassa kapinoti passatha ekassa lahucittassa andhabālassa kapino hetu ayaṃ sakalassa yūthassa anayo avuḍḍhi mahāvināso katoti.
atk-s0513a3:3256_6: Paṇḍitamānīti yo sayaṃ bālo hutvā “ahaṃ paṇḍito”ti attānaṃ maññamāno paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akatvā sakassa cittassa vasaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0513a3:3256_7: so sacittassa vasaṃ gantvā yathāyaṃ dubbacakapi matasayanaṃ sayito,
atk-s0513a3:3257_0: Na sādhūti bālo nāma balasampanno yūthassa parihārako na sādhu na laddhako.
atk-s0513a3:3257_4: Sakuṇānaṃva cetakoti yathā hi tittirasakuṇānaṃ dīpakatittiro divasampi vassanto aññe sakuṇe na māreti,
atk-s0513a3:3257_8: Hito bhavatīti kāyenapi vācāyapi manasāpi hitakārakoyeva.
atk-s0513a3:3257_9: Ubhinnamatthaṃ caratīti yo idha puggalo ete sīlādayo guṇe attani passati,
atk-s0513a3:3257_11: paññāpi sutapariyattipi atthī”ti tathato jānitvā gaṇaṃ pariharanto attano ca paresañca attānaṃ parivāretvā carantānanti ubhinnampi atthameva carati.
atk-s0513a3:3258_4: yasmā sīlādīni attani samanupassanto ubhinnamatthaṃ carati,
atk-s0513a3:3258_5: tasmā paṇḍito etāni sīlādīni viya attānampi tesu tuletvā “patiṭṭhito nu khomhi sīle paññāya sute”ti tīretvā
atk-s0513a3:3258_6: patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā dhīro gaṇaṃ vā parihareyya,
atk-s0513a3:3258_7: catūsu iriyāpathesu eko vā hutvā paribbajeyya vatteyya,
atk-s0513a3:3258_8: parisupaṭṭhākenapi vivekacārināpi imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgateneva bhavitabbanti.
atk-s0513a3:3258_9: Evaṃ mahāsatto kapirājā hutvāpi vinayapariyattikiccaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3259_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a3:3263_0: Dvāsattatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bakabrahmānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:3263_1: Tassa hi “idaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ acavanadhammaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3263_2: ito aññaṃ lokanissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma natthī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajji.
atk-s0513a3:3263_3: Heṭṭhūpapattiko kiresa brahmā pubbe jhānaṃ bhāvetvā vehapphalesu nibbatto,
atk-s0513a3:3263_4: tattha pañcakappasataparimāṇaṃ āyuṃ khepetvā subhakiṇhesu nibbattitvā catusaṭṭhikappaṃ khepetvā tato cuto aṭṭhakappāyukesu ābhassaresu nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:3263_9: Bhagavā tassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0513a3:3263_11: evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3263_12: Atha brahmā bhagavantaṃ disvā “ehi kho, mārisa,
atk-s0513a3:3263_18: niccaṃ idaṃ dhuvaṃ idaṃ sassataṃ idaṃ kevalaṃ idaṃ acavanadhammaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3263_19: idañhi na ca jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati,
atk-s0513a3:3263_20: ito ca panaññaṃ uttari nissaraṇaṃ natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a3:3264_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā bakaṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca “avijjāgato vata bho bako brahmā,
atk-s0513a3:3264_2: yatra hi nāma aniccaññeva samānaṃ niccanti vakkhati…pe…
atk-s0513a3:3264_7: iti maṃ esa anuyuñjanto anubandhatī”ti cintetvā yathā nāma dubbalo coro katipaye pahāre labhitvā “kiṃ ahameva coro,
atk-s0513a3:3264_8: asukopi coro asukopi coro”ti sabbepi sahāyake ācikkhati,
atk-s0513a3:3264_9: tatheva bhagavato anuyogabhayena bhīto aññepi attano sahāyake ācikkhanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3267_0: Ayamantimā vedagū brahmapatti, asmābhijappanti janā anekā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a3:3268_0: Tattha dvāsattatīti na kevalaṃ bho gotama, ahameva,
